CONCLUSION: Violation of Article 6 - Right to a fair trial (Article 6 - Administrative proceedings;Article 6-1 - Impartial tribunal;Independent tribunal)
TEXT: CARDINAL . The applicant was born in DATE and lives in GPE .
CARDINAL . The facts of the case , as submitted by the parties , may be summarised as follows .
CARDINAL . On DATE the applicant was dismissed from ORG due to non - compliance with disciplinary rules .
CARDINAL . On DATE the applicant brought an action before ORG and requested the annulment of the decision to dismiss him .
CARDINAL . On DATE ORG rejected the applicant ’s case , taking into account the “ secret documents ” submitted by ORG . These documents were not disclosed to the applicant .
CARDINAL . On DATE the applicant ’s request for rectification was rejected by the same court .
